articles.title: Memorandum of DPRK FM Distributed as Official Document of UNSC
articles.content:
Memorandum of DPRK FM Distributed as Official Document of UNSC
Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The memorandum of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK "Dissolution of the 'UN Command' is the essential requirement in defending peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and in the Asia-Pacific region" was distributed as an official document S/2013/20 of the UNSC on Jan. 18.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Czech Republic
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Czech Republic
Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Milos Zeman upon his election as president of the Czech Republic.
					Kim in his message wished the president of the Czech Republic success in his responsible work for the prosperity of the country and its people's wellbeing.

articles.title: WPK Cell Secretaries Tour Pyongyang
articles.content:
WPK Cell Secretaries Tour Pyongyang
Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The participants in the Fourth Conference of Cell Secretaries of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) are touring Pyongyang amid hearty welcome of citizens.
					They visited the Pyongyang 326 Electric Wire Factory.
					
					Before a mosaic portraying the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu in the factory's compound, they were briefed on the proud course covered by it under the guidance of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					After seeing materials and data displayed at the rooms devoted to education in revolutionary history and factory's history, they watched various kinds of electric wires being churned out from production processes updated by the efforts of its workers and technicians with indigenous technology. 
					
					At the Rungna Dolphinarium, they looked round a dolphin aquarium underground and a cave displaying different species of fish, being briefed on how it was built in peculiar style on the picturesque Rungna Islet.

articles.title: Kim Chaek, Paragon of Revolutionaries
articles.content:
Kim Chaek, Paragon of Revolutionaries
Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Chaek (Aug. 1903-Jan. 1951) was a paragon of Korean revolutionaries, who was intensely loyal to the leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					With ardent patriotism and high degree of class awareness, he embarked on the road of revolutionary activities in his school days.
					
					For years, he had been in agony, groping for an outstanding leader who would guide the Korean revolution in a right way.
					
					It was after meeting with Kim Il Sung that Kim Chaek focused his activities on ensuring the close unity of Korean revolutionaries with Kim Il Sung as their leader.
					
					After the birth of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland by Kim Il Sung in May, Juche 25 (1936), he energetically pushed ahead with the work to rally broad masses of people under the banner of the Association.
					
					As an able commanding officer of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army, he tactfully commanded lots of battles in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle, thus dealing heavy blows to the Japanese aggressors.
					
					He had always regarded loyalty to the leader as lifeblood. 
					
					Soon after Korea's liberation from the Japanese colonial rule, he paid primary attention to defending the personal safety of President Kim Il Sung and took the lead in organizing the bodyguards before anything else.
					
					Though there were obstruction moves of the factional elements, he actively helped Kim Il Sung in his work for founding the party and displayed his indomitable will and fully discharged his duty as the first president of Pyongyang Institute, entrusted by the President.
					
					Possessed of high ability, he, as a deputy premier of the country, creditably implemented the tasks given by Kim Il Sung. 
					
					In the early period of the Fatherland Liberation War (Jun.1950-Jul.1953), he was active as a front commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA). At the time of temporary strategic retreat on the part of the KPA, he built up defences for Pyongyang in line with Supreme Commander Kim Il Sung's operational plan and commanded defence battles with success.
					
					In the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, there are a city, an iron and steel complex and a university named after Kim Chaek.
					
					And produced were such feature films dealing with Kim Chaek's life as "The Road to the Front" and "The Untrodden Path".

articles.title: U.S. Moves to Develop and Deploy New Type WMDs under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Moves to Develop and Deploy New Type WMDs under Fire
Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- Recently the U.S. temporarily deployed 9 F-22 Raptors at Kadena base in Okinawa. 
					Meanwhile, it tested super-bunker buster at the missile test field in New Mexico State of the U.S.
					
					Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard: 
					
					This is a criminal act going against the trend of the times towards disarmament and peace and a dangerous action of escalating the global arms race. 
					
					Whenever the U.S. staged war exercises every year against the DPRK in collusion with south Korea, it hurled huge nuclear offensive means including extra-large nuclear-powered carriers, Aegis ships and nuclear submarines into the Korean Peninsula and its vicinity, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					The DPRK is one of the principal targets of bunker busters. 
					
					The U.S. Defense Department had already openly announced that the development of bunker buster was made to meet the urgent requirements of the U.S. Pacific Command and the U.S. Central Command for carrying out operations against the DPRK and Iran. 
					
					The U.S. seeks to mount surprise attacks on the military strategic targets of the DPRK with Stealth fighters carrying bunker busters in a bid to disable them in "contingency" on the Korean Peninsula. For this purpose the U.S. tested super-bunker busters and temporarily deployed Stealth fighters in Okinawa close to Korea. 
					
					It is a foolish daydream for the U.S. to bring down the DPRK by force of arms. The DPRK will never slacken even a moment the work for bolstering up the nuclear deterrent for self-defence but reinforce it in every way to cope with the U.S. dangerous arms buildup.

articles.title: DPRK People Ready for All-out Action against U.S.
articles.content:
DPRK People Ready for All-out Action against U.S.
Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The servicepersons and civilians in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are hardening their will to turn out in an all-out action against the United States, which recently cooked up an anti-DPRK "resolution" over its peaceful satellite launch.
					Song Kyong Hak, an officer of the Korean People's Army, told KCNA:
					
					"We, servicepersons, are now filled with the fixed will to annihilate at once the hostile forces infringing upon the sovereignty of the country.
					
					The powerful striking means of the Paektusan revolutionary army have already been in full readiness to shower fire of merciless punishment on the disgusting den of evils and show what a real war is like."
					
					O Myong Bok, a worker at the Pyongyang Electric Cable Factory 326, said:
					
					"Our army and people do never allow the nation's sovereignty and the supreme interests of the country to be violated.
					
					Sovereignty of each country and nation is not something presented or defended by others. What can ensure their sovereignty and dignity is only the military strength for independence and justice built up by their own efforts."
					
					Ri Myong Hwan, a worker at the Hukryong Coal Mine, said:
					
					"Peace can never be expected on this planet as long as the U.S., the empire of evil, remains intact.
					
					We, workers, will show the mettle of the Korean working class in a sacred war to wipe out the U.S. imperialists, the sworn enemy of the nation, from the earth."
					
					Ri Kwang Nam, a worker of the Taean Electric Appliances Factory, expressed his strong will to stand in the van of an all-out action to punish the U.S. and its followers.

articles.title: Phungsan Dog Indigenous to Korea
articles.content:
Phungsan Dog Indigenous to Korea
Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The children's film "Story of Phungsan Dog" has gained popularity among children in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					The dog, indigenous to Korea, rose to fame as plucky, intelligent and viable.
					
					According to a person concerned, various species of animals inhabited in the mountainous northern areas of Korea in the Middle Ages. Among those animals were dogs which later turned into the progenitor of the present-day Phungsan dog.
					
					Phungsan is the name of a remote mountainous area, and it was the home of the dog. It is believed that the geographical condition has made the species of dog keep its blood pure.
					
					One can distinguish the dog by its thick hind legs. Its eyes are smaller than other species of dogs, with black and grey apples.
					
					The Phungsan dog has good appetite with strong resistance to coldness and diseases.
					
					It is listed as one of the national heritages.

articles.title: Fermented Flatfish Good for Health in Winter
articles.content:
Fermented Flatfish Good for Health in Winter
Pyongyang January 31 (KCNA) -- Korean people like fermented fish mixed with varieties of spices and cereals.
					The dish has long history mainly in coastal areas of Korea and its kind varies with locality.
					
					People in South Hamgyong Province favor the dish prepared with flatfish and hard-finned sandfish and those in Kangwon Province with walleye pollack.
					
					The fermented flatfish mixed with boiled millet is more popular than others and highly nutritious. Flatfish, caught in months from December to March, are usually used in making the dish.
					
					"Tonguibogam" (encyclopedia of traditional medicine of Korea) says that flatfish is good for recovering health and millet helps warm human body, especially in winter days. Millet is also good for prevention of diabetes and anemia.
					
					With garlic and red pepper contained in it, the dish is as efficacious as kimchi (pickled vegetable) for preventing cancer.

articles.title: Magpie, Koreans' Favorite Bird
articles.content:
"Short Biography of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" Published
						
 Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- Book "Short Biography of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was published in the DPRK.
					 The book was published for the first time on the occasion of the 60th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and its enlarged edition was brought out in Juche 92 (2003).
					
					 The new book has 12 chapters, 96 sections and epilog dealing with immortal revolutionary exploits of the President and his personality as a peerlessly great man.
					
					 The first four chapters cover the period from April 1912 to August 1945. They tell stories that the President pioneered the revolutionary cause of Juche and led the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle to victory, achieving the historic cause of the country's liberation.
					
					 The next four chapters cover the period from August 1945 to December 1960. They deal with the feats the President performed by successfully implementing the historic tasks for carrying out social revolution at two stages, waging the Fatherland Liberation War, conducting the postwar rehabilitation and construction and laying  foundations of socialism, and establishing the Korean-style socialist system centered on the popular masses in the DPRK.
					
					 The last four chapters cover the period from January 1961 to July 1994. They deal with the immortal feats the President performed by successfully leading socialist construction of various phases and thereby building a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence and fully demonstrating its dignity and might.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Embodying Spirit of Conference of Cell Secretaries of WPK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Embodying Spirit of Conference of Cell Secretaries of WPK
Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday runs an editorial calling for fully embodying the spirit of the 4th Conference of Cell Secretaries of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					The conference provided an important landmark in increasing the fighting capability of the WPK in every way and achieving a final victory in building a thriving nation as required by the new historic era for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, the editorial says, and goes on: 
					
					What is important in the spirit of the conference is to successfully carry forward the undying exploits of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in party building and develop the WPK into the eternal party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					It calls for bringing about a radical turn in the overall work of the party by increasing the function and role of the party cells in every way as required by the new era of the Juche revolution. 
					
					It also calls for giving fresh spurs to the general advance for opening up a turning phase in building a thriving nation by increasing the fighting capability of the party in every way. 
					
					It is the intention of the WPK Central Committee to make the whole prevalent with the same revolutionary party discipline whereby all party work was done in a vital, dynamic and innovative manner as displayed in the 1970s. 
					
					The WPK reposes deep trust in its cells and its Central Committee has great expectation for the roles of the secretaries of the party cells. 
					
					All the participants in the conference and the party cells secretaries should dynamically and positively conduct the work for fully embodying the spirit of the conference with pride and honor of having glorified the 4th Conference of Cell Secretaries of the WPK as a significant one noteworthy in the history of the WPK. 
					
					When the party cells are strong, the WPK remains unshaken in any adversity and there is nothing we are afraid of or we cannot do.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Defusing Nuclear Threat
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Defusing Nuclear Threat
Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The policy of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces for confrontation with the DPRK, and the U.S. huge nuclear forces that back it are the greatest threat to the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a bylined article.
					South Korea has turned into a U.S. arsenal for a nuclear war which may go off any time and a dangerous advanced base for invading the north. On Feb. 12, 1957 the U.S. was closeted with the south Korean puppet forces over the deployment of nukes in south Korea and unilaterally declared the abrogation of paragraph d of article 13 of the Armistice Agreement banning the shipment of new weapons at the 75th meeting of the Military Armistice Commission held in June that year. In July it declared its forces present in south Korea would "start arming themselves with nukes". On January 29, 1958 the U.S. officially announced that nukes were introduced into units of the U.S. forces in south Korea.
					
					It has systematically shipped nukes into south Korea and, at the same time, built and expanded nuclear arsenals in its different parts and introduced even units in charge of stockpiling nuclear bombs and distributing equipment to get fully prepared to ignite a nuclear war any time.
					
					The U.S. has long attempted to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK. It deployed nukes in south Korea for the first time in August 1950, the early period of the Korean war.
					
					The successive ruling quarters of south Korea not only allowed the U.S. to introduce nukes but worked with bloodshot eyes to do harm to fellow countrymen with nukes in league with foreign forces for aggression.
					
					A nuclear war has not yet broken out on the Korean Peninsula even amid the ever-mounting nuclear threat of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers entirely thanks to the DPRK's nuclear deterrent for self-defense.
					
					Now that the UN Security Council whose mission is to safeguard the independent rights and security of its member nations has been reduced to a defunct marionette international body which is playing into the hands of the U.S., it has become clearer than ever before that the sovereignty of the country and the nation should be defended by one's own powerful strength, not by words and appeal.
					
					The DPRK will never abandon its right and position gained by it at the cost of blood but bolster up its nuclear deterrent for self-defence in every way to safeguard the dignity and sovereignty of the nation as firm as a rock.

articles.title: DPRK Will Punish Hostile Forces: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will Punish Hostile Forces: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and its allies that endorsed the UN Security Council's "Resolution" 2087, which found fault with the DPRK's peaceful satellite launch, responded to the DPRK's declaration of an all-out action with a fiery rhetoric that the DPRK's countermeasure is "provocative" and "the north should be made to right its option".
					Rodong Sinmun Thursday says that they regard the peaceful satellite launch, an option of every country, as a crime out of their hostile stand, in fear of the rising dignity and might of Songun Korea. But the DPRK will not be frightened by their rhetoric nor change its option. 
					
					The U.S. crudely violates international law and the UN Charter and resorts to high-handed and arbitrary practices when it sees that they are not in its favor. Still it abuses the UN Security Council's function and forcibly creates unreasonable "resolutions" when it is set to take issue with others. It is the U.S. inveterate bad habit.
					
					Typical examples are the UN Security Council's "Resolutions" 1718, 1874 and 2087.
					
					They were a product of the U.S. hostile policy aimed to force the DPRK to disarm itself, and topple its social system.
					
					The present situation proves that physical counteraction, not words, should be taken to settle accounts with the U.S. which regards jungle law as the rule of its survival. The situation also shows the iron truth that one's sovereignty should be protected by one's own efforts.
					
					Hostile forces should clearly know that they can not estimate the might of the DPRK, dignified with independence and ever-victorious with Songun, with the Western view on value or the imperialists' way of calculation. 
					
					The army and people of the DPRK do not make an empty word. The world will be made to clearly see how the Koreans, who are convinced of the justness of their cause, punish hostile forces of all stripes and emerge as a final victor in their just path for defending sovereignty.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage Combined Military Drills
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage Combined Military Drills
Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The 20th Motorized Infantry Division of the south Koran puppet army announced on Jan. 30 that it would stage combined military drills in the areas of Ryoju and Yangphyong, Kyonggi Province, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					The war exercises for invading the north would be staged two times from Feb. 4 to 5 and from Feb. 13 to 20 with huge armed forces and offensive means involved under the pretext of coping with "infiltration" and "provocation".
					
					Ceaseless north-targeted war drills from the outset of the year are increasing the danger of war on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: S. Korean Broadcasting Service Denounces "Special Amnesty" for Criminals
articles.content:
S. Korean Broadcasting Service Denounces "Special Amnesty" for Criminals
Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea finally granted "special amnesty" to his confidants who committed irregularities and corruption, despite unanimous denunciation of people of different social standings.
					South Korean Broadcasting Service (KBS) on Jan. 30, referring to the "special amnesty," said this was not amnesty but "collective escape from prison".
					
					KBS recalled that "special amnesty" was granted to Choe Si Jung, former chairman of the Broadcasting and News Agency Committee, and Pak Hui Thae, former speaker of the "National Assembly", who were tried for their involvement in scandals.
					
					Chongwadae claimed that the action was taken on the basis of law and principle and it is aimed to achieve the great unity of the people but this rhetoric only increases sense of collapse, it deplored.
					
					It is an improper attitude that Lee Myung Bak abused power for his confidants involved in scandals, it noted.
					
					Lee asserted that there would be no "special amnesty" during the tenure of his office, but he enabled those criminals to escape from prison in a group though it was less than two months since the real penalties against them were confirmed or they spent less than the half of their prison terms, it noted, adding that this is sparking off protest from people of different social standings.

articles.title: U.S.-Sponsored Anti-DPRK "Resolution" Denounced by Chongryon Officials
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Recognize Government Employees Union
						
 Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- 87 civic and social bodies in south Korea held a news conference in Seoul on Jan. 22 at which they urged  the puppet government to recognize the Government Employees Union and reinstate the fired employees.
					 The chairman of the union and others spoke there.
					
					 They accused the regime of refusing to accept the application for creating the union and suppressing it after labeling it an illegal one.
					
					 They deplored that more than 130 unionists were sacked for the mere reason that they voiced opposition to irregularities and corruption.
					
					 They said that nowhere in the world the legal status of the government employees unions are not recognized.
					
					 They urged the authorities to recognize the union and reinstate the unreasonably discharged unionists as early as possible.
					
					 The authorities should no longer be allowed to deprive the unionists of their rights, they stated, expressing the will to stage a dynamic action to have their issue settled.

articles.title: French Organization Urges UN to Withdraw Anti-DPRK "Resolution"
articles.content:
French Organization Urges UN to Withdraw Anti-DPRK "Resolution"
Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The France-Korea Friendship Association issued a statement on Jan. 23, denouncing the U.S.-masterminded "resolution" that was adopted at the UN Security Council.
					The statement said that the association severely condemns the member countries of the UNSC for their unjustified double standards policy of finding fault with the satellite launch by the DPRK even though they freely conduct nuclear tests and launch satellites.
					
					It strongly protested the UNSC for straining the tension in the Korean Peninsula and escalating confrontation and conflict, quite contrary to peace and stability by fabricating the "resolution on sanctions" upon the DPRK.
					
					It urged the UNSC to immediately cancel the "resolution" against the DPRK.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Observed in Peru
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Observed in Peru
Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- A Peruvian committee for celebrating the 71st birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Lima on January 23.
					Tani Baler Lopera, international secretary of the Communist Party of Peru "Red Motherland", was elected chairperson of the committee.
					
					The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Czech Republic
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Czech Republic
Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the Czech Republic for commemorating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Prague on January 24.
					Miroslav Stepan, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					The preparatory committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events including seminar, photo exhibition and film show on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Day of Shining Start to Be Observed in Austria
articles.content:
Day of Shining Start to Be Observed in Austria
Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- An Austrian committee for marking the 71st birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Vienna on January 25.
					The chairman of the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and the DPRK was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events praising the sacred revolutionary career and immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Commemorated in Spain
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Commemorated in Spain
Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the Korean Friendship Association for commemorating leader Kim Jong Il's birth anniversary (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Tarragona, Spain on Jan. 24.
					Alejandro Cao de Benos, chairman of the Korean Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					The committee decided to open a special website and carry photos and works of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.
					
					The branches of the association in Spain and other countries decided to organize colorful events.

articles.title: DPRK's Exercise of Its Independent and Legitimate Right to Satellite Launch Supported in Slovenia
articles.content:
DPRK's Exercise of Its Independent and Legitimate Right to Satellite Launch Supported in Slovenia
Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The Slovenia-Korea Friendship Association issued a statement on Jan. 24 in support of the statements of the DPRK National Defence Commission and Foreign Ministry.
					The statement said the whole world admired the successful satellite launch of the DPRK and even hostile forces including the U.S. acknowledged it, adding:
					
					It is a stark fact that the use of ballistic missile technology is the only method of putting a satellite into orbit.
					
					Nevertheless, the U.S. is far-fetchedly insisting that the DPRK is not allowed to launch even a satellite for peaceful purposes because its carrier rocket can be converted into a long-range ballistic missile, a threat to the U.S.
					
					This is nothing but a brigandish logic and a height of self-deception and double standards.
					
					The Slovenia-Korea Friendship Association resolutely condemns and rejects the unreasonable action taken by the U.N. Security Council to wantonly infringe upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and deprive it of its right to satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					
					It fully supports the DPRK's exercise of its independent and legitimate right to satellite launch.
					
					The association strongly demands the UNSC immediately withdraw its anti-DPRK "resolution" and put an end to interference in it.
					
					It extends full support and solidarity to the stand on denuclearization clarified by the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Highly Praised by Peruvian Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Highly Praised by Peruvian Figure
Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- Generalissimo Kim Jong Il is the great leader whose life was totally dedicated to the revolutionary cause of Juche, the building of a thriving nation, independent and peaceful reunification of Korea and realization of the global cause of independence.
					Felix Fernandes Torres, secretary general of the Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, said this at the inaugural ceremony of the Peruvian committee for celebrating the 71st birth anniversary of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il held on January 23.
					
					He noted:
					
					Kim Jong Il will always live in the hearts of the peoples of Korea and the rest of the world for his immortal exploits on behalf of the Korean revolution and the global cause of independence.
					
					His idea and cause have been successfully carried forward by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un without an inch of deflection.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun llama a trabajar con el espiritu de IV conferencia de secretarios de celula del PTC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun llama a trabajar con el espiritu de IV conferencia de secretarios de celula del PTC
Pyongyang, 31 de enero (ACNC) -- El periodico Rodong Sinmun, en su editorial fechado 31, subraya la necesidad de trabajar ateniendose al espiritu de la IV Conferencia de los Secretarios de Celula del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					Ese conclave preparo el jalon importante en fortalecer por todos los medios el poderio combativo del Partido conforme a la demanda de nueva epoca historica del cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche y lograr la victoria final de la construccion de un Estado prospero, comienza el editorial y prosigue:
					
					El postulado de la conferencia reside en fortalecer y desarrollar el PTC como partido de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il al continuar con brillantez sus inmortales hazanas realizadas en esa materia.
					
					Aboga igualmente por producir gran cambio en todas las labores del Partido mejorando en todos los aspectos la funcion y el papel de sus celulas conforme a la demanda de nueva epoca de la revolucion del Juche.
					
					Llama ademas a dar nuevo acicate a la marcha general para abrir la coyuntura trascendental de la construccion de un Estado prospero centuplicando la combatividad del Partido.
					
					El Comite Central del PTC se propone hacer reinar en todas sus filas el revolucionario modo de trabajo que exige impulsar todas las labores de manera fresca, animada e innovadora, al igual que en la decada de 1970.
					
					Hoy dia, el Partido confia mucho en las celulas y el CC del PTC cifra gran esperanza en el papel de los secretarios de ellas.
					
					Todos los participantes en la conferencia y las celulas del Partido deben trabajar con osadia para materializar cabalmente el espiritu del mismo conclave con el orgullo de haberlo celebrado como gran cita a registrarse en letras mayusculas en la historia del PTC.
					
					Si las celulas del Partido son fuertes, el Partido no vacilara en cualesquier circunstancias adversas ni habra nada temible ni inalcanzable en este mundo.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena desarrollo de nuevas armas de exterminio masivo de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena desarrollo de nuevas armas de exterminio masivo de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 31 de enero (ACNC) -- Recientemente, Estados Unidos desplego provisionalmente en la base de Kadena de Okinawa 9 unidades de "F-22 Raptors", ultramoderno avion de combate tipo Stealth.
					Por otra parte, se realizo la prueba de la bomba de perforacion subterranea en el campo de ensayo de misiles del Estado de Nuevo Mexico.
					
					Con respecto a ese tema, el diario Rodong Sinmun divulgo el jueves un comentario individual cuyo texto resumido sigue abajo:
					
					El desarrollo y la ubicacion de nuevas armas de destruccion masiva por Estados Unidos son actos criminales que desafian a la corriente de la epoca hacia el desarme y la paz y fomentan la carrera armamentista en escala mundial.
					
					Durante los ejercicios de agresion al Norte de Corea que libra cada ano con los titeres surcoreanos, EE.UU. introduce en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno el portaaviones nuclear de tamano supergrande, los buques Aegis y los submarinos nucleares y otros medios de ataque nuclear.
					
					Uno de los blancos principales de "bunker-buster", bomba capaz de destruir las instalaciones subterraneas, es precisamente la RPDC.
					
					Ya el Departamento de Defensa estadounidense ha anunciado abiertamente que el desarrollo de "bunker-buster" obedecio a la peticion urgente de la comandancia de las fuerzas norteamericanas en el Pacifico y la comandancia central de EE.UU. que toman la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea e Iran como blancos de sus operaciones.
					
					EE.UU. intenta neutralizar las instalaciones estrategicas militares de la RPDC al asaltarlas en el "tiempo de emergencia" de la Peninsula Coreana con los aviones tipo Stealth cargados de las bombas por el estilo de "bunker-buster".
					
					Pero, EE.UU. no podra doblegar nunca a la RPDC por via militar.
					
					Frente al aumento armamentista de EE.UU., la RPDC consolidara en todo lo posible su disuasivo nuclear para la autodefensa.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun insiste en eliminar la fuente de amenaza nuclear
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun insiste en eliminar la fuente de amenaza nuclear
Pyongyang, 31 de enero (ACNC) -- La mas grave amenaza a la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana es la politica conflictiva anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de Estados Unidos y el Sur de Corea y las enormes fuerzas nucleares del imperio que la sustentan.
					Revela asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual divulgado en su edicion de este jueves y continua: 
					
					Ahora el suelo surcoreano se ha convertido en el arsenal nuclear de EE.UU. y su base avanzada para la guerra de agresion contra la RPDC. 
					
					El 12 de febrero de 1957, EE.UU. acordo con los titeres surcoreanos el despliegue de armas nucleares en suelo surcoreano. Y en la 75a reunion de la Comision Militar de Armisticio, realizada en junio del mismo ano, declaro unilateralmente la cancelacion de la clausula D del articulo 13 del Acuerdo de Armisticio que prohibe la introduccion de armas modernas. En julio, anuncio que las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea "comenzaran el armamento nuclear" y el 29 de enero de 1958, confirmo oficialmente el despliegue de armas nucleares en sus unidades distribuidas en el Sur de Corea. 
					
					Al mismo tiempo, EE.UU. construyo y amplio los depositos nucleares por doquier del territorio surcoreano y desplego hasta las unidades encargadas de la conservacion y suministro de bombas atomicas. 
					
					De esta manera, ultimo todos los preparativos para desatar la guerra nuclear en cualquier momento. 
					
					La intencion de EE.UU. de atacar preventivamente con armas nucleares a la RPDC se remonta a agosto de 1950, periodo inicial de la pasada guerra coreana, cuando emplazo por primera vez esos artefactos en suelo surcoreano. 
					
					Los sucesivos gobernantes surcoreanos permitieron la entrada de esas armas de destruccion masiva y actuaron con frenesi para atacar con ellas a la parte connacional en contubernio con las fuerzas agresoras extranjeras. 
					
					En la Peninsula Coreana no se ha desatado todavia la guerra nuclear gracias al disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa de la RPDC. 
					
					Puesto que el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, que toma por su mision garantizar los derechos soberanos y la seguridad de los paises miembros de la ONU, se ha hecho como herramienta de EE.UU., se hizo evidente que la soberania de cada pais y nacion no se defiende con llamamientos o palabras sino con fuerzas propias. 
					
					La RPDC no renunciara jamas sus derechos y posicion conquistados a costa de sangre y consolidara por todos los medios su disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa para defender la dignidad y la soberania de la nacion.
